grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 脳炎【ノウエン】brain inflammation, encephalitis, cerebritis
kun reading compounds: 炎【ほのお】flame, blaze, flames (of intense emotion, e.g. love, jealousy, anger), passion
炎検出器【ほのおけんしゅつき】flame detector
瞋恚の炎【しんいのほのお】intense antipathy (like a blazing fire), flames of rage
嫉妬の炎【しっとのほのお】flames of jealousy
